name: Escalation
description:
BE WARNED! THIS GAME WILL BREAK YOUR WILL TO LIVE.
No memorization. No cheats. No powerups. Pure skill!!!

You will be angry. You will be frustrated, but you will come back for more!

Whether its level 5 or level 35, you will reach the limit of your concentration and eye-hand coordination. Then you will push yourself past your limit!

Raw speed and focus is the only way to win Escalation.

Conquer all 50 levels to become a true Escalation master.

The road will be long and frustrating, but DO NOT GIVE UP!

Good luck... you will need it.

-MochiBits

----------
